name: 2D Platformer (Ammar Syed)
description:
This is my 2D Platformer Tutorial.

Modifications I will be making are:

  • Create a complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level.
  • Add multiple additional levels and tie them in to create a logical progression in your game.
  • Replace sound effects in the game to update the sound design of the game. 

Credits:

Created by Ammar Syed
